All About Me

Hi, my name is Luke and I am a developer! I am passionate about coding and people!
I hope to one day add a lot more content to this website and also do a lot more cool projects.
While most of my skills are coding focused, I am interested in UX and want to learn.
I love to play tennis, eat, play video games, play piano/guitar and a bunch of other stuff.
Taco Bell is by far my favorite fast food and I also love IHOP.
My favorite city in the world (as of now) is Orlando and I have attached a map.
Also the background describes the current Michigan Weather.
